PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-13972014-12-11,  ,  CH,  , 
ActPublic Servants Disclosure Protection Act
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE MARIE-JOSÉE BÉDARD of Gatineau, Quebec, a Judge of the Federal Court, to act as Chairperson of the Public Servants Disclosure Protection Tribunal for a period of six months or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever comes first.
